Question.Subject: Is there any kind of public transport available between noida and greater noida?

ChosenAnswer:
UP Roadways buses ply frequently between Sector-37 crossing in Noida and Kasna in Greater Noida, passing through Pari Chowk.
Apart from these there are numerous cabs that ferry passengers between Sector-37 crossing and Pari Chowk.

Answers.Answer: Yes bus service is available. it is not frequent.
